name: Come To MaMa
description:
**Keep Baby alive! Don't let the monsters eat him! Throw the arrows to lead them off the cliff and keep Baby Safe!**

Press ***Arrow Keys*** to move

Press ***Space*** to throw

Press ***Left Control*** to stop the baby with milk

** And Full Controller Support **

Hint: Keep baby die no more than  15 times to unlock the Second Ending

Fullscreen for best graphics

Created for Ludum Dare 46

 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/come-to-mama

Create by @Issac Du and @Louis Hayes G

Music by @Sam Oz

                Hint: Keep the baby alive more to unlock the Second Ending
